description:
Name of the game: A Tale of Day and Night

How to play: Use your mouse and click on things. You can interact with things with your left mouse button and scroll through your actions with the right mouse button.

Goal: Interact with the world, solve small puzzles and enjoy the story based on a myth about Sun and Moon

Core Concept: Our Game is a Point & Click Adventure where you have to Retell a Tale, based on a Myth. The Myth addresses certain social categories, which the Player can experience and learn from. The World our Game is set in, is full of challenging Puzzles other Minigames where the Player learns about the Brazilian Culture and other important social category.
